title: Albergaria (Manuel José Soares de Lobão e)
original_title: Albergaria (Manuel José Soares de Lobão e)
body: He was a magistrate in Madeira, and on December 5, 1823, he sent a report to the Count of Subserra on the state and improvements of the island.

1823: Sending of the report on the state and improvements of the island
